title: Condact
content:
Looking for a source to purchase Condact by Dimitris Perdikopoulos, or suggestions for a similar font. It looks like it was on Ten Dollar Fonts at some point, but the links to purchase seem to have been removed. I've really been looking for a set of numerals with a 3 like contained in Condact, but also love the rest of the Condact design. I found it on Behance. Here's the link:  
 [https://www.behance.net/gallery/3702706/Condact-Typeface](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317161324/http:/typophile.com/wiki/https%3A/%252Fwww.behance.net/gallery/3702706/Condact-Typeface)
author: BlueStreak

comments.content:
Have you tried to send a message to Dimitris on behance?  
Go to this page and click "Message" (you have to login with an Adobe Id):  
 [http://www.behance.net/dperdiko](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317161324/http:/www.behance.net/dperdiko "http://www.behance.net/dperdiko")

**[Pakt](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317161324/http:/www.findmyfont.com/index.php/fonts/font-preview?fset=You-Work-For-Them%20%2F%20%28Commercial%29&ffam=YWFT%20Pakt%20-%20Regular&fid=c4ed4f05cd24dbb1b9c503838d5e17f8&fsize=60&text=ABCDEFGHIJKLMNOPQRSTUVWXYZ%20abcdefghijklmnopqrstuvwxyz%200123456789&wrap=2)** from You Work For Them [2001] has a similar |3| and similar design

**[Concurso Italian](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317161324/http:/www.findmyfont.com/index.php/fonts/font-preview?fset=BreakingTheNorm%20%2F%20%28Commercial%29&ffam=ConcursoItalian%20BTN%20Lt%20-%20Regular&fid=20ecc8043cf1c773802ece6c73faef4c&fsize=60&text=ABCDEFGHIJKLMNOPQRSTUVWXYZ%20abcdefghijklmnopqrstuvwxyz%200123456789&wrap=2)** by BreakingTheNorm [2003] also has a similar |3| but the overall design is different.

Right |3| but not low-waisted: [http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/4thfebruary/attentica-4f/](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317161324/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/4thfebruary/attentica-4f/ "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/4thfebruary/attentica-4f/")  
Low-waisted but wrong |3|: [http://fontfabric.com/canter-free-font/](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317161324/http:/fontfabric.com/canter-free-font/ "http://fontfabric.com/canter-free-font/")

Great suggestions. Thank you!

And Fvilanakis, I've been hesitant to join Behance just to send a message, but will probably do so. Good stuff happening in Athens; must be something in the water.
